Uses of Class
org.jfree.chart.needle.ArrowNeedle

Packages that use ArrowNeedle
Package Description
org.jfree.chart.needle
A range of objects that can be used to represent the needle on a CompassPlot.

  • Uses of ArrowNeedle in org.jfree.chart.needle

    Subclasses of ArrowNeedle in org.jfree.chart.needle
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  WindNeedle
    A needle that indicates wind direction, for use with the CompassPlot class.
